body.name: Arae Screen Protector for iPhone Xr/iPhone 11, HD Tempered Glass, Anti Scratch Work with Most Case, 6.1 inch, 3 Pack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 58 mins
features: [Compatible for] iPhone Xr / iPhone 11, 6.1 inch. Arae Screen Protector made of latest premium quality 9H Hardness 3D Round Edge Ultra-thin HD tempered glass, maintains the original response sensitivity and touch-screen accurate.

[Anti-Scratch / Oil / Fingerprint] Arae durable screen protector consistently protects your screen from scratch, shock, and impacts. Hydrophobic oleophobic screen coating protects against sweat and oil residue from fingerprints.
[Easy To Install] Includes Guidance frame to provide accurate installation. Dust-free, fingerprint-free, bubble free, one-push super easily installation.

[Case-friendly Design] The screen protector leaves enough space for the case to protect your phone, the screen protector will not be squeezed out of the screen by the case. EXCEPT cases with hefty raised edges such as battery cases.
[Package Includes] There are 3 screen protectors and 3 accessory bags in the package and 1*installation frame, each accessory bag includes 2*Guide Sticker, 1*Wet Wipe, 1*Dry Wipe, 1*cleaning cloth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Please watch our video if you would prefer video Installation Instruction :)

2.5D Rounded Edge The 2.5D rounded edges keep your fingers swiping and sliding smoothly across the screen. Clear and Sensitive The glass retains amazing clarity for viewing experience, maintains the original response sensitivity and touch-screen accurate. Strong Resistance 9H Hardness can effectively resist the scratches and absorb the severe external shocks.

Frequently Asked Questions: 1.The flexibility of the Glass Screen Protector is just the same as the plastic material, Is it made of tempered glass or plastic? A:This screen protector is a real tempered glass. The plastic flexibility is the exact reason why we call it tempered glass screen protector. Tempered or toughened glass is a type of safety glass processing treatment by controlled thermal or chemical to increase its strength and flexibility. 2.It can't tell it's Glass or Plastic by the appearance and we don't have the high-tech laboratory equipment at home, so what could we as a customer do to identify it? A: Well, there does have one simple, quick and cost-effective way to run a test all by yourself, and it's supper accurate.Based on the scientific fact that the Melting Point of most plastic at between 160 and 210 degrees Celsius while the glass material is at least over 1400 degrees Celsius, so is there a lighter around? 3.Does it come with a cleaning wipe to use prior to placing on the phone? A:Yes, the package includes: 9*Guide Stickers, 3*Wet Wipe&3*Dry Wipe,3*Dust Absorber, 1*cleaning cloth. 4.How can I remove bubbles? A:Before placing the screen protector, please first clean the screen by using kits in the package. If there are bubbles, please try to press the bubble by using your finger with a little force, and try to use a ruler or a credit card to help you with the problem, but a thin cloth pad is needed on the surface of the screen to avoid scratches on protector. 5.How can I remove a cracked glass screen protector? A:Lift the screen protector with the card from corners of the screen protector. Once the corner has been lifted off the device, hold the corner and remove slowly.( If you would ever find CHIP or CRACK on screen protector, for your safety, please wear glove to remove screen protector gently to avoid any possible potential damage or injury)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product that works well and is easy to install on your phone. It does not distort the view screen and the added protection provides piece of mind. Afterall, smart phones are not cheap, so it is important to protect your investment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and price
reviews.reviewText: These are very easy to install, and they look really nice on my iPhone 11. And you can’t beat the price. You get multiple screen protectors. I’m very happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved the guidance piece you put over the phone before you put the screen protector on! I didn’t have one bubble on my screen at all! Will def be purchasing again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, cheap, not so durable
reviews.reviewText: There are three in a pack but I broke the first one in 2days. Not as durable as you would want. Plus the sides don’t cover completely like the other brand ai used. But its cheap and easy to install. The wipes and sticker cleans the screen well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: I value my electronics, but it kills me to spend upwards of $40-60 on screen protectors or use bulky cases. This was a great alternative! Installed easily, has lasted me over a year now and my phone remains in near-perfect shape. The screen protector itself has very few scratches too! I definitely recommend a screen protector to everyone - this one is all you need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dropped my phone; screen protector did its job and screen is intact

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The application guide makes applying these screen protectors so easy! There’s no way to mess it up and application is flawless every time. The price for three is such a great value. If you drop your phone the tempered glass may crack, but it prevents your phone screen from cracking and it’s so easy to replace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: If your looking for a cheap screen protector this one works fine, Except it cracks randomly and chips often.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very Easy DIY screen Protector for your iPhone
reviews.reviewText: Anyone can fit this screen protector with the tools they have provided. We are getting 3 temper glass and the tool for $10. It’s a best price. I have been using this for past 3 months, not even a single crack. Best one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, easy to clean
Fácil de poner, cubre toda la pantalla y de buena calidad. Al poco tiempo el móvil se me cayó al suelo y no sufrió ningún rasguño.
